meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Janette Weedon, Director, Budget & Management Services
Ivan Guel, Assistant Director, Budget & Management Services

agenda_items.title: Approval of the November 7, 2024, Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Discuss Performance Review Process for Council Appointment
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the performance review process for council appointments.

agenda_items.title: Solid Waste Franchise Program Updates
agenda_items.description: Updates including program administration, proposed franchise fee increase, and recommended actions.

agenda_items.title: FY 2024-25 Budget Ordinance Changes
agenda_items.description: Discussion on changes to the budget ordinance for FY 2024-25.
agenda_items.presenter: Janette Weedon, Director, Budget & Management Services; Ivan Guel, Assistant Director, Budget & Management Services

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Items
agenda_items.description: Discussion of upcoming agenda items for December 11, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Quarterly Investment Report - 4th Quarter FY2023-24
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the quarterly investment report.

agenda_items.title: FY 2024-25 Fee Study Technical Corrections
agenda_items.description: Discussion on technical corrections for items inadvertently excluded from the fee ordinance.

agenda_items.title: American Rescue Plan Act - Monthly Financial Status Report
agenda_items.description: Monthly financial status report for the period ending October 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: CDBG Public Improvement Contract Rescission
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the rescission of the CDBG public improvement contract.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Internal Update on Internal Audit Reports
agenda_items.description: Update on internal audit reports released between October 12, 2024 and November 22, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review of Fair Park Management Agreement Right to Audit Clause
agenda_items.description: Review of the right to audit clause in the Fair Park management agreement.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item - Litigation Support Services Agreement
agenda_items.description: Discussion on a cooperative purchasing service price agreement for litigation support services.

agenda_items.title: Proposed Ordinance Amending Code of Ethics
agenda_items.description: Discussion on amending the Code of Ethics to establish the Office of the Inspector General.

agenda_items.title: 711 South St. Paul - Surplus Sale and Demolition Project Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the surplus sale and demolition project.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report
agenda_items.description: Report on technology accountability as of November 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Report on Progress of Family Gateway Property Repairs
agenda_items.description: Update on the progress of repairs as of November 2024.

agenda_items.title: High-Speed Rail Delegation to Japan 2024, Summary of Expenses
agenda_items.description: Summary of expenses related to the high-speed rail delegation to Japan.

financial_items.description: Authorizing the Issuance of $40,000,000 in Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation for Financing Stormwater Capital Projects
